price: Hakika juhudi zenu bila ya shaka ni mbali mbali.
footnotes: Hakika juhudi zenu bila ya shaka zimekhitalifiana; kwani wapo wenye kubahatika katika juhudi zao, na wako wasio bahatika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
